name: D-Stack
description:
D-Stack

An arcade physics puzzle game that mixes Tetris and Jenga. Try to take out as many blocks as possible from the tower without making it fall!

Controls:
  • W,A,S,D to move the camera around.
  • Click on any block to destroy it.
  • "R" or "Enter" to restart level
  • The bar on the right controls height of tower.

Created by: Ata Dogan and Arnau Llobera in 48 hours
